```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
library(lubridate)

sat <- as_date("2023-10-14")
sun <- sat+days(1)
mon <- sat+days(2)
tues <- sat+days(3)
wed <- sat+days(4)
thur <- sat+days(5)
fri <- sat+days(6)

advdate <- function(day, week) {
  date <- (day + weeks(week))
  dm <- paste(month(date, label = TRUE)," ", day(date))
  return(dm)  
}
```
